long_description: The NEMO Switch 1 Tent offers 3 shelter configurations in 1 versatile design: solo ground tent for backpacking, bug net for international travel and indoor/outdoor shelter for sleeping on a cot. Built-in cup holder and wide door are perfect for enjoying the campfire from the perch on your cot; when it's time for bed, just lay back and zip the door shut. Corner Retention Straps easily secure the NEMO Switch 1 Tent to your cot (cot sold separately). Includes the necessary stakes and guy lines to set up just like any other on-the-ground shelter. Corner pockets store a water bottle and mesh pockets keep personal items close at hand. Slip your headlamp into the light pocket; its light-diffusing fabric that casts an even glow throughout the tent (headlamp not included). The NEMO Switch 1 Tent comes with a roll-up style stuff sack, stakes, guyout cord and repair kit; optional footprint sold separately.
short_description: The NEMO Switch 1 Tent offers 3 shelter configurations in 1 versatile design: solo ground tent for backpacking, bug net for international travel and indoor/outdoor shelter for sleeping on a cot.
